entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 99 %

Wind: SW 20 km/h

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
